titleStmt.title: A demonstrative Scripture-proof from Mahometan times the kingdom of Christ must needs be in its succession, 1697. By T. Beverley.
titleStmt.author: Beverley, Thomas.
Beverley, Thomas. aut

notesStmt.note: Possibly an addition to his: The Scripture-line of time, from the first sabbath, to the great sabbatism of the kingdom of Christ.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
